title: Income and Taxes
description: This chapter explores how income is taxed, the differences between gross and net income, and strategies for managing income effectively.
learning_objectives: Distinguish between gross and net income
Understand various types of taxes and withholdings
Analyze a pay stub and identify deductions
Complete basic tax forms like the W-4
Calculate take-home pay and plan accordingly

skill_builder.title: W-4 Simulation
skill_builder.description: An interactive simulation that helps students understand how to complete a W-4 form and how different withholding choices affect take-home pay.
